wikipedia_page.main: Robert "Bobby" Thomson (born 21 November 1939) is a Scottish former  footballer who played as a defender. He played first played for Partick Thistle, joining Liverpool in December 1965 for £7,000. He made just six league appearances before joining Luton Town in August 1965 and later emigrated to Australia.
